body: The blood of fiends taints your line, manifesting physically, though it may be barely noticeable. Choose one of the following skills: Bluff, Intimidate, or Knowledge (planes). You gain a +1 trait bonus on checks with that skill, and it is always a class skill for you.
name: Fiend Blood
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Bloodline Race Traits/Fiend Blood
